mapper.select: SELECT EL_KEYNO ,EL_DATE ,ROUND(EL_DATA,3) as EL_DATA FROM ELECTRONIX WHERE DATE_FORMAT(EL_DATE,"%Y%m%d") = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), "%Y%m%d")
SELECT * FROM ELECTRONIX WHERE DATE_FORMAT(EL_DATE,"%Y%m") = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), "%Y%m")
SELECT * FROM ELECTRONIX WHERE DATE_FORMAT(EL_DATE,"%Y%m") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),"%Y%m")
SELECT * FROM ELECTRONIX WHERE DATE_FORMAT(EL_DATE,"%Y%m") = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR),"%Y%m")
